text: İyileşene kadar köyde kaldık Sonra da iki at bulup obaya döndük beyim
english: We stayed in the village until we recovered, and then we found two horses and went back to the room, sir.
Sir, we heard what happened to the Big Head bastard.

text: Bana iyi bir şey söyle Tangut
Sonunda en güvendiğim adamım olduğunu ispat ettin Tangut
english: You finally proved to me that you're my most trusted man, Tangut.

text: Sungur Tekin'in bizden aldıklarını geri getirdin
english: You brought back what Sungur Tekin took from us.

text: Konya'ya gidiyor Noyan. Halime Sultan'la o demirci de yanında
english: He's going to Iconia, Noyan, and Halima Sultan and that blacksmith are with him.
Now he'll get even more vicious.

text: Bundan sonra ona nefes aldırmak yok
Onu elimize düşürüp, bezdirene kadar durmak yok
english: There's no stopping until we've got him in our hands and we've had enough.
Thank God we're here for you, sir. Thank you, sir.

text: Hemen gidelim beyim Bu güzel günü kefere keserek geçirelim
english: Let's go now, sir. Let's spend this beautiful day in the wind.

text: Beyim Biz ne zaman Alpliğimizi geri alacağız?
english: Sir, when are we going to get our Alps back?

text: Bizim Alpliğimizi kim elimizden alabilir Doğan?
english: Who can take away our Alps, Doğan?

text: Biz Alp doğduk, Alp öleceğiz evelallah
english: We were born in the Alps. We're going to die.
Is there anything more than that?
When do we get our Alps called Tugtekin...

text: Tuğtekin Bey’den, Alplerimizi ne zaman alacağız beyim?
english: When will we receive our Alps from Tuğtekin Bey?

text: Toyun aldığını ancak toy verir Bamsı
english: It's the only way he'll be able to buy a ball, Bamsi.

text: Her şeyin bir vakti vardır elbet
İçimizdeki, dışımızdaki bütün hainler beni türlü iftiralarla karalarken…
english: While every traitor inside of us, outside of us, slanders me with all sorts of slanders...

text: …tereddüt etmeden bana inandınız Asıl sizler çok yaşayın
english: You believed in me without hesitation. Long live the rest of you.

text: Beni iyice anladın mı ahmak herif?
english: Do you understand me, you idiot?

text: Sungur Tekin ile Halime Sultan asla Alaeddin’in karşısına çıkmayacak
english: Sungur Tekin and Halima Sultan will never face Alaeddin
You'll go to the palace and weave your web

text: Onlar huzura çıkmadan önce işlerini göreceksin
english: You'll get your job done before they come out.
Early in the morning, you will leave for Alexandria

text: Yolda başına bir hâl gelmesin diye Tangut da seninle gelecek
english: Tangut will come with you so he doesn't get hurt on the way.
If you don't do what I say...

text: …Konya’ya gelir, seni kendi ellerimle gebertirim, bilmiş ol
english: ...I'll come to Konya, I'll kill you myself, you know.
Now get out of my sight

text: Noyan. Abdurrahman ve Hamza’yı da yanıma alayım mı?
english: Noyan, shall I take Abdurrahman and Hamza?
May Allah make your way clear.

text: Siz olmasaydınız bunca şeyin altından nasıl kalkardım hiç bilmiyorum
english: I don't know how I'd be able to do all this without you.
When you don't want to be Moses...
...my sister will send him a speed.
Servants are the means to take care of the sender

text: Ben giderim Lakin dervişim sana emanettir
english: I'll go, but my dervish is in your care.

text: Obanın mescidinde bir vazife verirsen iyi olur
english: You'd better give me a job at the Oba's place of worship.

text: Onları iyi beslersen, iyi yetiştirirsen iyi de hasat alırsın. Unutma
english: You feed them well, you raise them well, you get a good harvest.

text: Bu kutlu vazifeyi bana layık gördünüz ya şeyhim, Allah razı olsun
english: May God bless you, Sheikh, for you have found this blessed duty worthy of me.
I'll take care of my trust

text: Ögeday’ın şanlı ordusunu bu topraklarda telef ettin
english: You destroyed the glorious army of the element in this land

text: Komutanlık vazifesi yakandan düşene dek seninle mücadele edeceğim Noyan
english: I'll fight you, Noyan, until you're relieved of your command.

text: Kendi boyunu satıp Noyan’ın yanına geldiğin için mutlu musun Abdurrahman?
english: Are you happy that you sold your own height and came to Noyan?

text: Sadece Ögeday’ın şanlı ordusunda daha da yükselebilmek için buradayım
english: I'm just here to get even higher in the glorious army of Item
He sends us to die every day

text: Gölgemiz gibi ölümüne yaşarız her daim
english: We'll live to the death like our shadow

text: Başarısız olur da ölürsek ne âlâ
english: What good is it if we fail and die?
And when we get back here...
You're a real pain in the ass, Tangut.
Karabek will send Karabek to Konya tomorrow

text: Halime Sultan’ı sarayda Alaeddin’in huzuruna çıkmadan öldürmek ister
english: Halima wants to kill Sultan before he meets Alaeddin in court
He's gonna kill me before I even look at him.

text: Bakalım sen ne kadar dayanacaksın bu eziyete
english: Let's see how long you can endure this torment.

text: Bizim için ölümden gayrı yol mu var Tangut?
english: Is there a way out of death for us, Tangut?
We're not afraid of him either.

text: Öyle ya da böyle alacağım onu
english: I'll take it one way or the other.
What if Tugtekin resists this decision?

text: Öyle ya da böyle bu hepimiz için en hayırlısı olacaktır ağabey
english: One way or another, it'll be best for all of us, brother.

text: En azından kendi yolumuzda gitmeyi öğrenecek kadar sırtımızdan bıçaklandık
english: At least we've been stabbed in the back long enough to learn to go our own way.
My brother speaks the truth, Mother.

text: Bu iş bu toyda mutlaka bitmeli
Peki oğul, tek başına Noyan’la nasıl baş edeceksin?
english: How will you deal with Noyan, alone, son?

text: Adım gibi eminim Ertuğrul ayağımıza dolanacak
english: I'm sure Ertugrul will get in our way.
It's like you're possessed by fear.
One of the two words is Ertugrul

text: Önlem almazsak sıra bize gelecek ağabey
english: If we don't take precautions, it'll be our turn, brother.
I haven't played my game yet.

text: Konya’da sarayda Ertuğrul gibilerini ben yetiştirdim
english: I raised the likes of Ertugrul in the palace in Iconium.
Let's take some time to enjoy the glory.

text: Ertuğrul sandığından çok daha zeki ağabey
english: Ertugrul is much smarter than you think, brother.
Then we'll see how smart he is
What if he finds out what we did?

text: Kocabaş gibi bizi de ortaya çıkarırsa?
english: What if he finds out about us like a big boy?

text: Beni neden burada görmek istedin Noyan?
english: Why did you want to see me here, Noyan?

text: Kayılar ile Dodurgalılar iç savaşın eşiğinden Efrasiyab

english: Before winter ends and the war begins...
We have to pay for both of them.

text: İkimiz bu işin üstesinden geliriz Noyan
english: You and me, we'll get through this, Noyan.

text: Bilirim, Moğol ordusunun önünde Tengri Dağı gibi duracaklar
english: I know, they will stand before the Mongol army like Mount Tengri
They will not defeat the army of the element.
But they're gonna hurt us so bad.

text: Ordumuz Konya’ya girene kadar bize zarar verecekler
english: They'll hurt us until our army enters Konya.
What do you want from me, Noyan?
Did you bring the gold the sun asked for?

text: Sürüyü ve malları almaya gittiğinde altınları yanında götürmeyesin
english: When you go to get the herd and the goods, don't take the gold with you.

text: Noyan, anlaşmamız altınları… Ne diyorsam onu yap
english: Noyan, we have a deal, the gold... do as I say.
The gold is on its way, from Erzurum.
While Obada waits for the gold...
There's something I want you to do.

text: Babanız ne kadar talihli bir adam
english: What a fortunate man your father is.

text: Her gün ayağı için ona taze ot toplarsınız
english: Every day you gather fresh grass for his feet.

text: Onun gibi bir babam olduğu için asıl ben talihliyimdir Gündoğdu Bey’im
english: I'm lucky to have a father like him.

text: Sizi alacak adam da en az babanız kadar talihli olacaktır
english: The man who will take you will be as fortunate as your father.

text: Dediğiniz gibi bir yiğit çıkar da içimizdeki güzelliği de görürse…
english: Like you said, if a hero comes along and sees the beauty in us...

text: …o vakit bize boyunu boylayıp soyunu soylamak düşer Gündoğdu Bey’im
english: ...then it's up to us to go down and tell your lineage, Mr. Gündü.

text: O vakit gönlümdekini sana söylemenin vakti gelmiştir
english: Then it's time to tell you what's in my heart.

text: Ben seninle ve inşallah evlatlarımla bir ömür geçirmek isterim
english: I'd like to spend a lifetime with you and my children, hopefully.

text: Gönlün ne güzel der Gündoğdu Bey’im
english: Your heart says it's beautiful, Mr. Gündü.
Where would you go like that?
Ertugrul won't stand idle in the toy

text: Eğer bu hâlde gidersen Ertuğrul’un işini daha da kolaylaştıracaksın
english: If you go like this, you'll make it easier for Ertugrul.

text: Toy, Alpbaşlığını Ertuğrul’dan eli çolak olduğu için almıştı
english: Toy took the Alps from Ertugrul, because his hand was broken.

text: Sen de şu an aynı durumdasın
english: You're in the same situation right now.

text: Eğer toya katılırsan Ertuğrul bunu kullanacaktır
english: Ertugrul will use it if you agree with the toll.

text: Her ne olursa olsun toya katılacağım Gökçe
english: No matter what happens, I'm going to join the club, Gökçe.

text: Ertuğrul babam dâhil bütün toyu ikna edip istediklerini yapacağını sanırsa, yanılır
english: If Ertugrul thinks he can convince my father to do what he wants, he's wrong.
He'll see that I'm not alone
Brother Deer, there's no time to lose
Let him go to Obaya, Ertuğrul Bey, at once.

text: Halime Sultan ile Sungur Tekin Hayatları tehlikede
english: Halima Sultan and Sungur Tekin Lives are in danger
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Esirgeyen ve bağışlayan Yüce Allah’ın doksan dokuz adıyla
english: In the name of the Lord God, the Lord, the Giver, the Lord, in the name of ninety-nine.
Gentlemen, we've had a hard time.
We felt the enemy breathing down our necks

text: Ertuğrul Bey’in sayesinde kurulan tuzakları atlattık şükür
english: Thanks to Ertugrul Bey, we survived the trap.

text: Şimdi de Hayme Ana’nın isteğiyle bir araya geldik
english: Now we meet at the request of Mother Hayme

text: Ertuğrul Bey’i de toyda aramızda görmek istedim
english: I wanted to see Ertugrul Bey with us at the toy.
Dear lords of Dodurga, and of Kaiy.
After the raid disaster we had...

text: …her iki obanın Alplerini tek bir baş Alpin emrine verdik
english: ...we have placed the Alps of both obans at the command of a single head of Alpin.
...and today we stand by our decision to the fullest.

text: Arkasındasınız da o hâlde ne istersiniz?
english: If you're behind him, then what do you want?

text: Ertuğrul Bey’in vazifelerinin alındığı toydan bugüne değin…
english: To this day, Ertugrul Bey has been taken away from the young man's duties...
...we've seen what he's saying come out of his mouth.
It must have been true Yeah, it must have been true

text: Ertuğrul Bey’imizin söylediği her söz doğru çıktı
english: Every word our Lord Ertugrul said proved true

text: Şimdi de pişman mı olduk dersiniz?
english: You think we're regretting it now?

text: Ertuğrul Bey olsaydı bunların hiçbiri olmazdı deriz
english: If it had been Mr. Ertugrul, none of this would have happened.
The enemy's fierceness is at stake

text: Bir daha canımız yanmasın diye tedbir almak isteriz
english: We want to take precautions so we don't get hurt again.

text: Başalpliğimi elimden almak istersiniz öyle mi?
english: You'd like to take away my starter, wouldn't you?

text: Başalplik vazifesinin yeniden bize verilmesini talep ederiz
english: We demand that we be given back the lead mission.
We'll take whatever opportunity you can get...

text: Güç, kudret ne demek bilir misin Tuğtekin?
english: Do you know what power means, Tugtekin?

text: Öfkene ve sinirine hâkim olarak istikamet üzere olmaktır
english: To be in the direction of anger and anger

text: …Tuğtekin Bey’in görevi Alpleri bir ve diri tutmaktı
english: ...Büğtekin Bey's duty was to keep the Alps one and alive.
But you have failed in your duty.
...has brought us to the brink of spilling brother's blood.
You've finally made your point, Ertugrul.

text: Şimdi de bu fırsatı kullanmak istersin
english: Now you want to take this opportunity.

text: O çolak elinle mi geçeceksin Alplerin başına?
english: Are you going to cross over the Alps with that lame hand of yours?
To the top of the Alps.
We want the dawn to pass.
Yes, he's right. Mr. Gündüz must pass.
And I went to the top of the Alps...
...I'd like it to pass by at dawn.

text: Müsaaden olursa, senin ve beylerinin ne düşündüğünüzü bilmek isterim
english: If you'll excuse me, I'd like to know what you and your gentlemen think.

text: …gayrı bu meseleye bir dur demek gerek
english: I'd have to put a stop to this.
What do we tell the Alps?
What are we gonna tell people?
If every young man's duty changes...

text: …ahali demez mi bunlar ne iş görür?
english: Don't you think that's what they're for?

text: Müsaadenle beyim, birkaç kelam da ben etmek isterim
english: If you'll excuse me, sir, I'd like to say a few words.
It's been a long time since he's been able to rest.

text: Millet toyda birlik sağlanamadığı için eziyet çeker
english: People suffer because the naive can't be united.

text: İçte biz, dışta düşman böyle mücadele ettikçe…
english: Inside us, the enemy on the outside, as long as we fight like this...

text: Beyim, biz Kayılarla birlik olup bir yola baş koymuşsak…
english: Sir, if we're in league with the apricots and we're on a road...

text: O vakit toyun beylerine karar düşsün
english: Then let the men of the league decide.

text: Şimdi, Gündoğdu Bey’in Alpbaşı olmasını isteyen beyler…
english: Now, gentlemen who want Mr. Gündü to be the Alphead...

text: Allah bu vazifeyi bana layık gören her iki obanın beylerinden de razı olsun
english: May God bless the gentlemen of both the obans who see me worthy of this task.

text: Bilin ki iki obanın Alplerini de kardeşim bileceğim
english: Know that I will know both the Alps of the Obans, my brother.

text: Onları tek bir babanın evlatları gibi cenge hazır hâle getireceğim
english: I'll make them ready to fight like the sons of a single father.
May Allah not disgrace any of us by our decisions.
May God not shame my son, Mother.
How did you do it, Mr. Silver?

text: Ha? Beni bir kalemde beylerin önünde nasıl harcadın?
english: How did you waste me in front of the gentlemen in a pen?
I didn't waste you. Your father did.

text: Baban da, diğer beyler de kararlarını önceden vermişlerdi
english: Your father and the other gentlemen had already made their decision.
They were going to take the title away from you.

text: Keşke elimden bir şey gelseydi evlat
english: I wish there was something I could do, son.

text: Düğününün tadını çıkar Güzel gelinimizle gerdeğinin keyfini sür
english: Enjoy your wedding. Enjoy your wedding with our beautiful bride.

text: Asıl vazifen, asıl imtihanın o vakit başlayacaktır
english: That's when your real task will begin.

text: Baban artık beylik yükünü taşıyamaz Görmez misin?
english: Don't you see your father can no longer carry the burden of the company?

text: Hasta o Fazla vakti de yoktur
english: He's sick. He doesn't have much time.

text: Şunu bil ki o vakit geldiğinde…
english: Just know that when the time comes...
To go to ask for girls tomorrow...
I'm not going to divorce her.
If you're going to be happy...
...if you're going to breed a lineage of holy blood...

text: Yarın kız istemeye geleceğimizi söylemek için…
english: To tell you that we're coming to ask for girls tomorrow...
I'd appreciate it if you'd let someone know.
If that's what's in your heart...
...it's up to us to let it go to the best of luck.
May God give them both patience.

text: Sence Goncagül Hatun ağabeyime eş olabilir mi ana?
english: Do you think Goncagül Hatun could be my brother's mother?
The dawn has not been peaceful
He'll have to choose his own way from now on.
When's he gonna come back to me, son?

text: Sultan Alaeddin’e Atabey Ertokuş’la ilgili bilgileri götürdü
english: Sultan Alaeddin took information about Akabey Ertokuş.
He'll come back and tell the folks about us.

text: …şüphesiz ki sen tuzak kuranların en hayırlısısın
english: You are the best of planners.

text: Bize kurulmuş tuzakları boşa çıkar ya rabbim
english: May the snares of our Lord come to nothing.
Don't leave me to my enemies.

text: …bir tespihin taneleri gibi dağılmış parça parça olmuş ümmet için can vereyim
english: I will die for the people who have been torn apart like the grains of a rosary.
Don't take your hand off us.
Let's not be hunted down by enemies.

text: Adını güneşin doğup battığı her yere taşıyalım
english: Let's move his name to wherever the sun rises and sets

text: …ezan-ı Muhammet, gök kubbenin her yerinde sonsuza dek yankılansın
english: May Your Majesty forever resonate all over the sky.
...keep me on the right path, Lord.

text: Abdurrahman Alp, Noyan’dan haber getirmiştir beyim
english: Abdurrahman Alp brought news from Noyan, sir.

text: Saray da onları öldürmesi için Karabek’i peşlerinden göndermiştir
english: And the palace sent Karabek to kill them.
What am I gonna do, Mom?

text: O kadınla aynı döşeğe girmesine gönlüm nasıl razı olacak?
english: How am I supposed to live with that woman on the same mattress?
If you love your husband, you'll fight, girl.
He knows what you do for him.
He knows your love, he knows your respect
That's why he can't divorce you.
That's why he doesn't show affection.

text: Her gün böyle parça parça ölmekten kurtaraydı
english: Every day, it saved me from dying in pieces like this.

text: …Halime Sultan’ın da, Deli Demir’in de hayatı tehlikededir
english: ...Halime Sultan's life is at stake, and Mad Demir's is at stake.

text: Ertuğrul Bu iş böyle olmaz kardeşim
english: Ertugrül That's not how it works, brother

text: Oba da, anam da sana emanettir ağabey
english: Oba and my mother are in your care, brother.

text: Başım dara düştüğünde ilk sen bileceksin
english: When my head falls apart, you'll be the first to know.
No, brother. I hope you don't take too long.

text: Lakin düşersen de her zaman arkanda olacağım, bilesin
english: But if you fall, I'll always be there for you.

text: …kayınbabanın karşısında nasıl ezilip büzüldüğünü görmeye geleceğim
english: ...I'll come to see how your father-in-law has been crushed and shriveled.
